comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of June 14, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A02E6DD1038E633A... names Passow as captain of the American liner St. Paul

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In February 1915, the St. Paul, although slower than the Lusitania, which also did the New York to Liverpool run, was preferred by many Americans, who felt it would be safer to sail under the American flag. Passow was the captain of the St. Paul. See The Washington times., February 27, 1915, HOME EDITION, Page 7 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84026749/1915-02-27/ed-... and Omaha daily bee., February 14, 1915, NEWS SECTION, Page 8 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn99021999/1915-02-14/ed-...
